attributes.action: Ask BBC folks to play some great TV shows to raise people’s spirits across UK
attributes.additional_details:
Peoples spirits need lifting- people now are low and anxious and having to isolate .. The news is scaring people .. older folk think it’s worse than the war .. 
so- why can’t we create a tv channel via the BBC that is free for all and focuses on happier things - and can maybe create a version aimed at age ranges of 60yr old people & some for 40yr old people.

Programs could include 
only fools n horses
Fawlty towers
Royal family
The Office
Some mothers do have em
Brittas empire
Little Britain
attributes.background:
Influence the BBC to play good stuff instead of repeated rubbish films.. and to play tv series that our older generation of people will really like too.
 Basically to create 2 new BBC Channels- BBC Comedy Classic & BBC Comedy.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the BBC.
